title: DROP FPS
body: After new patch I have -150 fps WTF!!

replies.body: You could have some bad game files that became corrupt after patching, or some driver issues as well.  Our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide should help with this!
